verbose_text: The GLP-1R signals primarily through the generation of cyclic adenosine monophosphate (cAMP).11 As expected, BETP potently augmented the cAMP responses to the GLP-1 breakdown product and weak agonist GLP-1 (9-36) NH 2, but not fully active GLP-1 (7-36) NH 2.
evidence: GLP-1R signals primarily through the generation of cyclic adenosine monophosphate (cAMP).11 As expected, BETP potently augmented the cAMP responses to the GLP-1 breakdown product and weak agonist GLP-1(9-36)NH 2                       , but not fully active GLP-1(7-36)
